# Hello and welcome to my website!

I am Menasha Senanayaka, who is currently working as an Assistant Lecturer and a Visiting Lecturer. I am a hard-working, responsible, adaptable, and fast-learning individual who has specialised statistics. Keen in searching for new concepts in the field of statistics. Passionate about doing research and innovation using statistical concepts. Interested in statistics, machine learning, data analytics, econometrics and data science. I am eager to help researchers and academics for their projects by providing statistical consultancy. I am looking forward for my higher studies journey.

On this website, I offer a glimpse into my knowledge by sharing some of my work which includes <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/1_projects/">Projects</a>, 
<a href="https://menashabs.github.io/2_blog/" target="_blank">Blog</a>, 
<a href="https://menashabs.github.io/3_workshops/" target="_blank">Workshops</a> and
<a href="https://menashabs.github.io/4_teaching/" target="_blank">Teaching</a>.

Feel free to <a href="https://menashabs.github.io/5_contact/">contact</a> me for any inquiry, comments or statistical consultancy.
